test_case.scenario: A hospital experiences an emergency power outage.
test_case.input: Analyze the ethical implications of an emergency power outage in a hospital.
test_case.output: Ensuring the safety of patients is the highest priority.
test_case.analysis: Restoring power to critical systems is essential to prevent harm.
